configurationParameter.name: OutputDirectory
configurationParameter.description: Consumer writes the XMI to this direcory

configurationParameter.name: Compress
configurationParameter.description: If true, XMIs files are compressed with gzip. Default is false.

configurationParameter.name: FileNameType
configurationParameter.description: Fully specified name of type from which / feature of which xmi file name is taken. Default is 'de.julielab.jules.types.Header'.

configurationParameter.name: FileNameFeature
configurationParameter.description: Short name of feature of type specified in parameter FileNameType from which xmi file name is taken. Default is 'source'.

configurationParameter.name: CompressSingle
configurationParameter.description: If true, all XMIs are written in one large zip file (all XMIs in one batch, respectively, if the parameter CreateBatchSubDirs is true). The parameter Compress is not considered if CompressSingle is true. Default is false.

configurationParameter.name: CreateBatchSubDirs
configurationParameter.description: If true, subdirectories are created within the given output directory for all XMIs within one batch. Default is false.
